creator: Red So
descriptionHtml:
We passionate about helping you to do less and get more business. Trusted by over 62,000 businesses worldwide. Boutir allows you to handle everything from marketing to orders on mobile.

Some of the cool features Boutir offers:

• A custom domain name easy to remember and stay on top of the mind
• Simple and mobile friendly website design that makes product search and checkouts easy for customers
• Facility of product reviews and ratings to attract more customers
• Effective promo codes to boost sales during holidays or peak season
• "Smart Sales Manager" to assist you to run marketing campaigns to promote your products or services, drive traffic, acquire new customers and get the insights
• Tier based membership program to offer exclusive discounts to your loyal customers
• Seamless social media integration such as importing products from your Instagram account, installing Facebook Pixel for retargeting, creating Facebook Shop to reach more people
• Wide variety of payment methods such as Google Pay, Apple Pay, Stripe, PayPal, Alipay, bank transfer & cash on delivery
• Fast and convenient way to connect with your customers on the go through Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, LINE, WeChat, KakaoTalk, Viber...etc
• SEO to get higher rank on search engines and increase your organic traffic
• Push notifications for every order you receive so you never miss a beat


We’d love to hear from you. Shoot us a message at https://m.me/boutir.hk

Learn more about Boutir at https://www.boutir.com

title: Boutir - Online Shop Builder

container.value: Unit E, 17/F, Billion Plaza 2, 10 Cheung Yue Street, Cheung Sha Wan, Kowloon, HONG KONG

creator: Red So
descriptionHtml:
Boutir brings you to the new era of phygital! Provide physical shopping experience in your online shop and sell with videos and livestreams. An online shop with a human touch means more sales! More than 140k merchants are enjoying the benefits of video commerce on Boutir now!

Run your video-centric online shop with one single app:

Run livestreams that sell
- Tell your product stories with livestreams like a shop assistant, and real-time interaction results in enhanced persuasiveness and shopping desire. ""Buy"" button in your livestream streamlines the shopping process

Replay livestreams
- Save livestreams for customers to replay. Edit them, acccording to live audience response, into powerful advertising materials

Shoot shoppable videos
- Product videos with a ""buy"" button enables customers to shop without pausing the video or switching websites, smoothing the shopping experience

Get data derived from videos
- Review watching and buying data from videos and livestreams to grasp customers' preferences

Put a welcome video in your shop's homepage
- Greet your customers with a cordial ""hello"" like shop assitants do

Besides shooting videos and running livestreams, our app also handles your shop's daily operation:

Automated order fulfilment
- Thanks to our partners like SF Express, Hongkong Post, ZTO Express and Alfred 24, our automated order fulfilment saves labour and time involved in order management and reduces risk of error

Smart advertising
- Put ads on social media or Google within our app with ease. It automatically targets your audience so more suitable customers know about your brand

Branded homepage and other custom pages
- Design your own homepage to show your brand identity. Catering to customers' needs, design other pages to run content like customers' reviews or additional product descriptions to help customers make shopping decisions

Benefits for customers
- Provide benefits like tiered membership and bulk purchase discounts to increase number of repeat customers

Unique link
- Your online shop can have its own unique, memorable link

Import photos from IG
- Conveniently import Instagram photos to build a shop, ready for transactions, from an IG account in minutes

Free trial
- Use all Essential Plan features for free for 14 days after registration

For more details, please visit Boutir's official website.
